history.proof: intros p a t Hrec. unfold udta_conv_1. unfold uad_conv_1. srun best use: u_conv1_5 unfold: udta_conv_1, uad_conv_1, u_conv_rec_1 inv: N.

exceptions.exn: In environment p : preDTA a : ad t : term Hrec : reconnaissance p a t The term "uad_conv_1 a" has type "N" while it is expected to have type "Map prec_list".
In environment p : preDTA a : ad t : term Hrec : reconnaissance p a t The term "uad_conv_1 a" has type "N" while it is expected to have type "Map prec_list".

In environment p : preDTA a : ad t : term Hrec : reconnaissance p a t Unable to unify "reconnaissance p a t" with "reconnaissance (M2 state (M0 state) (udta_conv_1_aux p)) match a with | 0%N => 1%N | N.pos p => N.pos p~1 end t".

In environment p : preDTA a : ad t : term Hrec : reconnaissance p a t Unable to unify "reconnaissance p a t" with "reconnaissance (M2 state (M0 state) (udta_conv_1_aux p)) match a with | 0%N => 1%N | N.pos p => N.pos p~1 end t".

original: intros p a t Hrec. unfold udta_conv_1. unfold uad_conv_1. apply rec_dta with (ladj := uad_conv_1 a). - rewrite u_conv_1_invar_0 with (ladj := uad_conv_1 a). apply Hrec. - apply Hrec.
